title: 148864025.it All Makes Sense
excerpt: When people say “it all makes sense” you can almost certainly guarantee that it doesn’t.

children.text: When people say “it all makes sense” you can almost certainly guarantee that it doesn’t.
That’s because people are busy. Or tired. Or harried, or stressed.
And they don’t often have the time (or patience) to do what they must to ensure that what they're reading or hearing
All the more the reason to put in the work to assure that they really do.
